channel.title: Help with shop
channel.description: I made a shop and none of da items are coming up,when i clcik on the npc and look at the shop.... i typed this into shops.cfg: [code]shop = 1 Fine_PKing_Supplies 2 1 4675 10 4712 100 6924 100 4757 100 4087 100 4585 100 1187 100 1048 100 [/code]

item.title: Help with shop
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

Pretty sure originally there is like 42 shops or so on a server…So shop = 1 is taken.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with shop
item.dc:creator: @jordan456 jordan456
item.description:
@jordan456 wrote:

Did you use the spacebar inbetween the numbers? Because you need to use the tab button.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with shop

item.description:
@r4p3dscape wrote:

I made a shop and none of da items are coming up,when i clcik on the npc and look at the shop… i typed this into shops.cfg:

shop = 1	Fine_PKing_Supplies				2	1	4675    10      4712    100     6924    100     4757    100     4087    100     4585    100     1187    100     1048    100
